member.name: P:MonoDevelop.FSharp.Shared.Lexer.queryLexState
member.summary: Provide a default implementation where we cache lex states of the current document. Assume that current document will be queried repeatedly Note: The source and defines are equality checked whenever this function is used which means that currentDocumentState is rebuilt whenever a different source or defines list is presented
